de.team33.libs.reflect.v3

Class Classes

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.team33.libs.reflect.v3.Classes

  • public class Classes
extends Object
    Utility for dealing with classes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Classes() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Stream<Class<?>> deep(Class<?> subject)
      Streams a class hierarchy that focuses on a given class and its superclasses but not its superinterfaces.
      static int distance(Class<?> subject, Class<?> superClass)
      Determines the distance of a given class <subject> from one of its superclasses or interfaces <superClass>, where the distance of a class to itself is always 0.
      static Stream<Class<?>> optional(Class<?> subject)
      Streams a given class that may be null.
      static Stream<Class<?>> wide(Class<?> subject)
      Streams a class hierarchy that focuses on a given class, its superclasses and its superinterfaces.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Classes

        public Classes()

    • Method Detail

      • distance

        public static int distance(Class<?> subject,
                           Class<?> superClass)
        Determines the distance of a given class <subject> from one of its superclasses or interfaces <superClass>, where the distance of a class to itself is always 0.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if <subject> ist not a derivative of <superClass>.
        NullPointerException - if one of the given Arguments is null.

      • optional

        public static Stream<Class<?>> optional(Class<?> subject)
        Streams a given class that may be null. In that case, the result is empty, otherwise it contains exactly the one given class.

      • deep

        public static Stream<Class<?>> deep(Class<?> subject)
        Streams a class hierarchy that focuses on a given class and its superclasses but not its superinterfaces.
        See Also:
        optional(Class), wide(Class)

      • wide

        public static Stream<Class<?>> wide(Class<?> subject)
        Streams a class hierarchy that focuses on a given class, its superclasses and its superinterfaces.
        See Also:
        optional(Class), deep(Class)
